templates.name: Hello World
templates.description: A simple contract that returns a greeting message - perfect for learning!

templates.name: Real World Assets (RWA)
templates.description: Real World Assets template with custody, settlement, and asset registration features

templates.name: Counter
templates.description: A counter that increments any number by 1 - great for learning smart contract logic!

notes: These are precompiled WASM binaries for fast contract deployment. No compilation required on request - templates return immediately as base64-encoded WASM.
